events.name: Ancient Alien City Found Under Ocean, Maybe Atlantis? imagine the tech left behind. UFO UAP Sighting News
events.description:
Date of discovery: July 2025
Location of discovery: Island of Crete, Greece
Coordinates: 35°02'55.0"N 24°38'13.0"E

Wow, just look at this. This is a prehistoric city that is massive in size...35km wide and 72km long! That last time water was that low was back 20,000 years ago before the ice age melt...that means prehistoric human society...and no prehistoric human civilization could make such a massive city. So that leave...yes! Aliens! 

This area is also close to Rocca Pia Italy, the area where the Friendship Alien Case that lasted many decades where humans and alien interacted helping each other. Just a few hundred miles away.

So the real question on everybody's minds...is this the long lost city of Atlantis? I say it is. Don't believe me? Remember the ancient gods of Greece? They were real and lived in Atlantis! You are looking at the city of the gods.

Scott C. Waring - UFO Sightings Daily

events.name: Pillar UFO 6 Floors High Over Colorado Springs, Colorado On June 4, 2025, UAP Sighting News. VIDEO!
events.description:
Date of sighting: June 4, 2025
Location of sighting: Colorado Springs, Colorado, USA
Source: NUFORC.org who I assist. 

Wow, check out this eyewitness video. I made a close up full screen and a slow motion clip so you can get a better look at it and judge for yourself. This is a pillar UFO also called a cigar UFO. The craft is spinning around as it moves forward and it's just amazing to see it in slow motion! This is undeniable proof that UFOs frequently visit Colorado. Notice that the UFO is not perfectly round, but it seems to be more like two long rectangle attached at the sides. Such a rare catch and although the video is short, it shows us its speed, shape, rotation as it moves, its hight never changes, and its very dark color...all add to the info in the file on this case thanks to the video. 
Scott C. Waring - UFO Sightings Daily 

Eyewitness states: 
Large cigar shaped ufo was incredibly shocking to see Spotted this cigar shaped UFO after leaving my mom’s house it was probably over a mile away from me when I filmed it and it still looked very large to my eyes. Camera doesn’t do justice how big is was. If I had to guess 3-6 story’s tall.
